author: Nick Nairn
method: For the blueberries, heat the caster sugar in a saucepan over a medium heat until the sugar melts and turns a deep amber colour. Add the blueberries and allow to burst, and soften the caramel. Set aside. For the syllabub, place all the ingredients into a bowl and mix together. To serve, place the syllabub into a serving bowl and spoon over the caramelised blueberries.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz caster sugar,  75g/2¾oz blueberries,  1 tbsp white wine,  50ml/2fl oz double cream, whipped,  150g/5&frac12oz Greek yoghurt,  50g/1¾oz ready-made lemon curd,  ½ lime, zest and juice,  sprig mint, to decorate,  2 lime wedges, to decorate
